msg: This Page will allow you to create 'Plans' and Set a PCF Cost Burndown Target
Plans are a way for you to estimate what size and quantity of PCF tenant(s) your PCF foundation will Host
PCF Costs represent your 'Estimated' Pivotal License Costs for your Foundation
IaaS Costs represent your 'Estimated' vSphere, AWS, vCloud Airm, or Openstack infrastructure Costs for your Foundation
Opex Costs represent your other variable costs for your Foundation like: FTEs, DataCenter Costs, Support, etc...
